body_html: I think this is confusing. I was also expecting that it works exactly the same way except the range is btw 0-255. In numpy, a True/False bool dtype is around when doing boolean indexing but you can also index for example with an array of dtype=uint8.
body_text: I think this is confusing. I was also expecting that it works exactly the same way except the range is btw 0-255. In numpy, a True/False bool dtype is around when doing boolean indexing but you can also index for example with an array of dtype=uint8.
body: I think this is confusing. I was also expecting that it works exactly the same way except the range is btw 0-255. In numpy, a True/False `bool` dtype is around when doing boolean indexing but you can also index for example with an array of dtype=uint8.
